Niniejszy serwis wykorzystuje pliki cook: This site uses cookies to function properly, by continuing to use the site you agree to their use.

Wyszukiwanie dogodnego miejsca nigdy nie: Searching for a convenient location has never been so easy! Modern, simple and elegant design makes finding the perfect offer a matter of minutes.
Wybierz to, co dla ciebie jest najważnie: Choose what's most important to you, and we'll match the best places to your preferences so you can spend your time the way you planned.

Niniejsza Polityka Prywatności informuje: This Privacy Policy tells you how we process
W jakim celu przetwarzamy Twoje dane?: For what purpose do we process your data?
Bez tego nie bylibyśmy w stanie świadczy: Without this, we would not be able to provide an adequate level of service and would not be able to help you. We collect and process your data only when you contact our helpdesk.
Przetwarzamy Twoje dane zawierające adre: We process your data including your email address and any other information you provide to us that is necessary to solve your problem (e.g. device, browser information). The extent of specific data processed varies depending on the problem.
Jak długo przetwarzamy dane?: How long do we process data?
Twoje dane będą przetwarzane do czasu ro: Your data will be processed until the problem is solved, you resign from our service or you withdraw your consent to the processing of your data (you grant your consent to the processing of your data by contacting the helpdesk, and you can withdraw it by sending us a message with this information).
Jakie prawa przysługują naszym Użytkowni: What rights do our Users have as data subjects?
Zgodnie z przepisami Ogólnego Rozporządz: In accordance with the provisions of the General Data Protection Regulation (Regulation (EU) 2016/679 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 27.04.2016 on the protection of natural persons with regard to the processing of personal data and on the free movement of such data and repealing Directive 95/46/EC - (RODO)), you have the following rights in relation to the processing of your personal data by us:
prawo dostępu do Twoich danych, w tym uz: The right of access to your data, including obtaining a copy of your data
prawo do usunięcia danych (prawo do byci: The right to erasure (the right to be forgotten)
prawo wniesienia skargi do organu nadzor: The right to lodge a complaint to the supervisory authority for the protection of personal data, which in Poland is the President of the Office for Personal Data Protection
prawo sprzeciwu (sprzeciw wobec przetwar: The right to object (objection to processing, objection to direct marketing, including profiling, legitimate objection to the processing of your data in the legitimate interest of the Administrator)
Jeżeli Twoje dane są przetwarzane na pod: If your data is processed based on consent:
masz prawo do wycofania zgody. Wycofanie: You have the right to withdraw your consent. Withdrawal of consent does not affect the lawfulness of the processing that was carried out on the basis of consent before its withdrawal. If your data is processed on the basis of consent or for the purpose of performing a contract (necessary for the provision of a service) you have the right to portability of personal data.
W celu realizacji powyższych praw należy: To exercise the above rights, please contact us through the help desk.
Komu udostępniamy dane?: Who do we share data with?
Twoje dane nie są nikomu udostępniane, p: Your data is not shared with anyone, we process it ourselves and use it in a way that helps you.
Wierzymy, że wyszukiwanie wymarzonego no: We believe that searching for dream accommodation can be quick and enjoyable. That's why we decided to create our own platform that will make it easier and provide everything you need in the simplest way possible.
Niniejsza Polityka dotyczy plików \"cook: This Policy applies to cookies and applies to
Poprzez pliki \"cookies\" należy rozumie: By cookies we mean text files, stored on the users' devices (such as computer, phone or tablet), sent by websites. These files allow the website to recognize the user's device and appropriately display the website tailored to the user's individual preferences, allow the website to be displayed in the user's language "remembered" by these files, and use other website settings selected by the user. Cookies usually contain the name of the website from which they come, the time of their storage on the terminal device and a unique number.
Pliki \"cookies\" używane są przez nas d: We use cookies to store information about which offers you have saved as "favorites" (and to display them later) and which notifications you have already closed, e.g. cookie notification, this information is stored locally on your computer and we do not use it in any other way, it is for your convenience only.
Stosowane są przez nas pliki \"stałe\",: We use "permanent" files, they remain on your device for the time specified in the parameters of cookies or until they are manually deleted by the user.
Nie, żadne informacje przechowywane w ty: No, no information stored in these files is personal or personally identifiable. They contain only information that allows you to view the saved offers.

W tym polu znajduje się 6 kategorii, są: There are 6 categories in this field, they are: beaches, city bikes, parks, playgrounds, dog runs and standard.
Abyśmy byli w stanie znaleźć nocleg dopa: In order for us to find accommodation that matches your preferences, you have to mark in each category how important it is for you. You can do this by clicking on a category and choosing a number from 1 to 5, where 5 means very important and 1 means unimportant or not important so we don't take the category into account.
Gdy już wszystko wybierzesz kliknij \"sz: Once you have selected everything, click "search" and we will do the rest and redirect you to the results page.
